SA20asmahsbu:amsa_1.1_0: arthajño 'rthavibhāvanāṃ prakurute vācā padaiś cāmalair duḥkhasyottaraṇāya duḥkhitajane kāruṇyatas tanmayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_1.1_1: dharmasyottamayānadeśitavidheḥ satveṣu tadgāmiṣu śliṣṭām arthagatiṃ niruttaragataṃ pañcātmikāṃ darśayan /
SA20asmahsbu:2.5_0: arthajño 'rthavibhāvanāṃ prakurute iti ka upadeśam ārabhya ko 'laṃkarotīti /
SA20asmahsbu:2.5_1: arthajñaḥ / kam alaṃkāram alaṃkaroti / arthavibhāvanāṃ kurute / kena vācā padaiś cāmalaiḥ / amalayā vāceti pauruṣayā amalaiḥ padair yuktaiḥ sahitair iti vistaraḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2.5_2: na hi vinā vācā padavyañjanair artho vibhāvayituṃ sakyata iti /
SA20asmahsbu:2.5_5: tanmaya iti kāruṇyamayaḥ / kasyālaṃkāraṃ karoti / dharmasyottamayānadeśitavidheḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2.5_6: uttamayānasya deśito vidhir yasmin dharme tasya dharmasya /
SA20asmahsbu:2.5_7: kasminn alaṃkaroti / satveṣu tadgāmiṣu / nimittasaptam yeṣām mahāyānagāmisatvanimittam ity arthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:2.5_9: pañcavidhaṃ / śliṣṭām arthagatiṃ niruttaragatāṃ pañcātmikāṃ darśayan /
SA20asmahsbu:2.5_10: [Msa_2] śliṣṭam iti yuktāṃ niruttaragatām ity anuttarajñānagatāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:2.5_11: tām idānīṃ pañcātmikāṃ arthagatiṃ dvitīyena ślokena darśyati /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_1.2_0: ghaṭitam iva suvarṇaṃ vārijaṃ vā vibuddhaṃ sukṛtam iva subhojyaṃ bhujyamānaṃ kṣudhārtaiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_1.2_1: vidita iva sulekho ratnapeṭeva muktā vivṛta iha sa dharmaḥ prītimagryāṃ dadhāti //
SA20asmahsbu:3_0_0: anena ślokena pañcabhir dṛṣṭāntaiḥ sa hi dharmaḥ pañcavidham artham adhikṛtya deśitaḥ sādhyaṃ vyutpādyaṃ cintyam acintyaṃ
SA20asmahsbu:3_1: so 'nena sūtrālaṃkāreṇa vivṛtaḥ prītim agrāṃ dadhādati /
SA20asmahsbu:3_3: yadā sa dharmaḥ prakṛtyaiva guṇayuktaḥ kathaṃ so 'laṃkriyata ity asya codyasya parihārārthaṃ trtīyaḥ ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_1.3_0: yathā bimbaṃ bhūṣāprakṛtiguṇavad darpaṇagataṃ viśiṣṭaṃ prāmodyaṃ janayati nṛṇāṃ darśanavaśāt /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_1.3_1: tathā dharmaḥ soktaprakṛtiguṇayukto 'pi satataṃ vibhaktārthas tuṣṭiṃ janayati viśiṣṭām iha satām //
SA20asmahsbu:4_0_0: anena kiṃ darśayati / yathā bimbaṃ bhūṣāprakṛtiguṇavad darśaṇagataṃ darśanavaśād viśiṣṭaṃ prāmodyaṃ janayaty evaṃ sa dharmaḥ
SA20asmahsbu:4_0_1: subhāṣitaiḥ prajkṛtyaiva guṇayukto 'pi satataṃ vibhaktārthas tuṣṭiṃ viśiṣṭāṃ janayati /
SA20asmahsbu:4_1: buddhimatām atas tuṣṭiviśeṣotpādanād alaṃkṛta iva bhavatīti /
SA20asmahsbu:4_2: ataḥ paraṃ tribhiḥ ślokais tasmin dharme trividham upaśaṃsaṃ darśayaty ādarotpādanārthaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_1.4_1: dharmarmo dvayavyavasthāstho vyañjanato 'rtho na ca jñeyaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_1.6_1: dharmas tathāyam abudhaṃ viparyayāt toṣayati tadvat //
SA20asmahsbu:5_5: naivedaṃ mahāyānaṃ buddhavacanaṃ kutas tasyāyam anuśaṃso bhaviṣyatīty atra vipratipannas tasya buddhavacanatvaprasādhanārthaṃ kāraṇavibhājyam ārabhya ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:6_0: ādāv avyākaraṇāt yady etat saddharmāntarāye paścāt kenāpi utpāditaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:6_1: kasmād ādau bhavatā na vyākṛtam anāgatabhayavat /
SA20asmahsbu:6_2: samapravṛtteḥ samakālaṃ ca śrāvakayānena mahāyānasya pravṛtter upalabhyate na paścād iti katham asyābuddhavacanatvaṃ vijñāyate /
SA20asmahsbu:6_3: agocarān nāyam evam udāro gambhīraś ca dharmas tārkikāṇāṃ gocaraḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:6_9: sa eva buddho yo 'bhisaṃbudhya evam bhāṣate /
SA20asmahsbu:6_10: bhāvābhāve 'bhāvād yadi mahāyānaṃ kiṃcid asti tasya bhāva siddhim idaṃ buddhavacanam ato 'nyasya mahāyānasyābhāvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:6_12: śrāvakayānaṃ budhavacanaṃ na mahāyānam iti na yujyate vinā buddhayānena buddhānām anutpādāt /
SA20asmahsbu:6_13: pratipakṣatvād bhāvyamānaṃ ca mahāyānaṃ sarvanirvikalpajñānāśrayatvena kleśānāṃ pratipakṣo bhavati tasmād buddhavacanaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:6_14: rutānyatvāt na cāsya yathārutam arthas tasmān na yathārutārthānusāreṇedam abuddhavacanaṃ veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:6_15: yad uktam ādāv avyākaraṇād ity anābhogād etad anāgataṃ bhagavatā na vyākṛtam iti kasyacit syād ata upekṣāyā ayoge ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:7_1: anena kiṃ darśayati / tribhiḥ kāraṇair anāgatasya mahataḥ śāsanopadravasyopkeṣā na yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:7_2: buddhānām ayatnato jñānapravṛtteḥ pratyakṣacakṣuṣkatayā śāsanarakṣayāś ca yatnavatvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:7_5: etad eva śrāvakayānaṃ mahāyānam etenaiva mahābodhiprāptir iti kasyacit syād ataḥ śrāvakayānasya mahāyānatvāyoge ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:8_0: vaikalyāt parārthopadeśasya na hi śrāvakayāne kaścit parārtha upadiṣṭaḥ śrāvakāṇām ātmano nirvidvirāgavimuktimātropāyopadeśāt /
SA20asmahsbu:8_1: na ca svārtha eva pareṣūpadiśyamānaḥ parārtho bhavitum arhati /
SA20asmahsbu:8_2: virodhāt svārthe hi paro niyujyamānaḥ svārtha eva prayujyate sa ātmana eva parinirvāṇārthaprayukto 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyata iti virodham etat /
SA20asmahsbu:8_3: na ca śrāvakayānenaiva cirakālaṃ bodhau ghaṭamāno buddho bhavitum arhati /
SA20asmahsbu:8_4: anupāyatvāt / anupāyo hi śrāvakayānaṃ buddhatvasya na cānupāyena ciram api prayujyamānaḥ prārthitam arthaṃ prāpnoti /
SA20asmahsbu:8_7: tathāpy anupadeśān na śrāvakayānam eva mahāyānaṃ bhavitum arhati /
SA20asmahsbu:8_8: na hi sa tādṛśa upadeśa etasminn upalabhyate /
SA20asmahsbu:8_9: viruddham vā cānyonyaṃ śrāvakayānaṃ cety anyonyavirodhe ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_1.10_1: upastambhasya kālasya yat hīnaṃ hīnam eva tat //
SA20asmahsbu:9_0: kathaṃ viruddhaṃ / pañcabhir virodhaiḥ / āśayopadeśaprayoga upatambhakālavirodhaiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:9_1_0: śrāvakayāne hy ātmaparinirvāṇāyaivāśayas tadartham evaupadeśas tadartham eva prayogaḥ parīttaś ca puṇyajñānasaṃbhārasaṃgṛhīta
SA20asmahsbu:9_1_1: upastambhaḥ kālena cālpena tadarthaprāptir yāvat tribhir api janmabhiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:9_3: tasmād anyonyavirodhād yad yānaṃ hīnaṃ hīnam eva tat /
SA20asmahsbu:9_5: buddhavacanasyedaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yat sūtre 'vatarati vinaye saṃdṛśyate dharmatāṃ ca na vilomayati /
SA20asmahsbu:9_7: tasmān na buddhavacanam iti kasyacit syād ato lakṣaṇavirodhe ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:10_0: anena ślokena kiṃ darśyati / avataraty evedaṃ svasmin mahāyānasūtre svasya ca śleśasya vinayaḥ saṃdṛśyate /
SA20asmahsbu:10_4: na dharmatāṃ vilomayaty athaiva hi dharmatā mahābodhiprāpataye tasmān nāsti lakṣaṇavirodhaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:10_5: agocarād ity uktam atas tarkagocaratvāyoge ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_1.12_1: bālāśrayo matas tarkas tasyāto viṣayo na tat //
SA20asmahsbu:11_0: adṛṣṭasatyāśreyo hi tarkaḥ kaścid āgamaniśrito bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:11_5: mahāyānas tu na niśritaṃ yāvat akhedavat /
SA20asmahsbu:11_7: ato na tarkasya tadviṣayaḥ / anupāyatvāt śrāvakayāne na buddhatvaṃ prāptam ity uktam atha mahāyānaṃ katham upāyo yukta ity upāyatvayoge ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:12_0: anena ślokena kiṃ darśayati / prabhāv audāryadeśanayā satvānāṃ paripāko prabhāv adhimuktito ghaṭanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:12_1_0: gāmbhīryadeśanayā avikalpanā ata etasya dvayasyāsmin mahāyāne deśanā sa copāyo niruttare jñāne tābhyāṃ yathākramaṃ [Msa_6]satvānāṃ
SA20asmahsbu:12_2: ye punar asmāt trasanti tadartham asthānatrāsādīnave kāraṇatvena ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_1.14_0: tadasthānatrāso bhavati jagatāṃ dāhakaraṇo mahāpuṇyaskandhaprasavakaraṇād dīrghasamayam /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_1.14_1: agotro 'sanmitro 'kṛtamatir apūrvācitaśubhas trasaty asmin dharme patati mahato 'rthād gata iha //
SA20asmahsbu:13_4: evaṃ paścād ādīnavaḥ / yena ca kāraṇena yāvantaṃ ca kālaṃ tat saṃdarśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:13_5: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇe tu satīti caturvidhaṃ trāsakāraṇaṃ darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:13_6: gotraṃ cāsya na bhavati sanmitraṃ vā avyutpannamatir vā bhavati mahāyānadharmatāyāṃ pūrvaṃ vānupacitaśubho bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:13_9: trāsakāraṇam uktam atrāsakāraṇaṃ vaktavyam ity atrāsakāraṇatve ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_1.15_0: tadanyānyānyābhāvāt paramagahanatvād anugamāt vicitrasyākhyānād dhruvakathanayogād bahumukhāt /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_1.15_1: yathākhyānaṃ nārthād bhagavati ca bhāvātigahanāt na dharme 'smiṃs trāso bhavati viduṣāṃ yonivicayāt /
SA20asmahsbu:14_1: atha śrāvakayānam eva mahānaṃ syād anyasya śrāvakasya pratyekabuddhasya vābhāvaḥ syāt /
SA20asmahsbu:14_4: vicitrasyākhyānād / vicitraś cātra saṃbhāramārga ākhyāyate na kevalaṃ śūnyataiva /
SA20asmahsbu:14_6: dhruvakathanayogād bahumukhād abhīkṣṇaṃ cātra śūnyatā kathyate bahibhiś ca paryāyais teṣu teṣu sutrānteṣu tasmād bhavitavyam atra mahatā prayogena /
SA20asmahsbu:14_7: anyathā hi sakṛt pratiṣedhamātrakṛtam abhaviṣyad iti /
SA20asmahsbu:14_8: yathākhyānaṃ nārthāt na cāsya yathārutam artho 'smād api trāso na yuktaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:14_9: bhagavati ca bhāvātigahanād atigahanaś ca buddhānāṃ bhāvo durājñeyas tasmān nāsmabhis tadajñānāt trasitavyam iti /
SA20asmahsbu:14_10: [Msa_7] evaṃ yoniśaḥ pravicayād viduṣāṃ trāso na bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_1.16_0: śrutaṃ niśrityādau prabhavati manaskāra iha yo
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_1.16_2: tato dharmaprāptiḥ prabhavati ca tasmin matirato
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_1.16_3: yadā pratyātmaṃ sā katham asati tasmin vyavasitiḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:16_0: śrutaṃ niśrityādau manaskāraḥ prabhavati yo yoniśa ity arthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:16_1: yoniśo manasikārāt tatvārthaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ prabhavati lokottarā samyagdṛṣṭis tatas tat phalasya dharmasya prāptis tatas tasmin prāpte matir vimuktijñānaṃ prādurbhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:16_2: evaṃ yadā pratyātmaṃ sā matir bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:16_3: katham asati tasminn eṣā vyavasitir niścayo bhavati naivedaṃ buddhavacanam iti /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_1.17_0: ahaṃ na boddhā na gabhīraboddhā buddho gabhīraṃ kim atarkagamyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_1.17_1: kasmād gabhīrārthavidāṃ na mokṣa ity etad uttrāsapadaṃ na yuktam //
SA20asmahsbu:17_0: yadi tāvad aham asya na boddhety uttrāsapadaṃ tan na yuktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:17_1: atha buddho 'pi gambhīrasya padārthasya na boddhā sa kiṃ gabhīraṃ deśayiṣyatīty uttrāsapadaṃ tad ayuktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:17_2: atha gambhīraṃ kasmād atarkagamyaṃ ity uttrāsapadaṃ tan na yuktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:17_3: atha kasmād gabhīrārthavidām evam mokṣo na tārkikāṇām ity uttrāsapadaṃ tan na yuktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:18_0: yasya hīnā cādhimuktis tataś ca hīna eva dhātuḥ samudāgata ālayavijñānabhāvanā /
SA20asmahsbu:18_1: hīnair eva sahāyaiḥ samānādhimuktidhātukair yaḥ parivāritas tasyāsminn audāryagāmbhīryasudeśite mahāyānadharme yady adhimuktir nāsti ata eva siddham utkṛṣṭam idaṃ mahāyānam iti /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_1.19_0: śrutānusāreṇa hi buddhimattāṃ labdhvā śrute yaḥ prakaroty avajñāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_1.19_1: śrute vicitre sati cāprameye śiṣṭe kuto niścayam eti mūḍhaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:19_0: kāmaṃ tāvad adhimuktir na syād aśrutānāṃ tu sūtrāntānām aviśeṣeṇa pratipakṣo na yuktiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:19_1: [Msa_8] śrutānusāreṇaiva hi buddhimattvaṃ labdhvā yaḥ śruta evāvajñāṃ karoti mūḍhaḥ sa saty evāvaśiṣṭe śrute vicitre cāprameye ca kutaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:19_2: kāraṇān niścayam eti na tad buddhavacanam iti /
SA20asmahsbu:19_3: na hi tasya śrutād anyad balam asti tasmād aśrutvā pratikṣepo na yuktaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:19_4: yad api ca śrutaṃ tad yoniśo manasi kartavyaṃ nāyoniśa ity ayoniśomanasikārādhīnave ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_1.20_0: yathārute 'rthe parikalpyamāne svapratyayo hānim upaiti buddheḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_1.20_1: svākhyātatāṃ ca kṣipati kṣatiṃ ca prāpnoti dharme pratighāvatīva //
SA20asmahsbu:20_0: svapratyaya iti svayaṃdṛṣṭapraāmarṣako na vijñānām antikād arthaparyeṣṭī /
SA20asmahsbu:20_1: hānim upaiti buddher iti yathābhūtajñānād aprāptiparihānitaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:20_2: dharmasya ca svākhyātatāṃ pratikṣipati tan nidānaṃ cāpuṇyaprabhāvāt kṣatiṃ prāpnoti /
SA20asmahsbu:20_3: dharme ca pratighātam āvaraṇaṃ ca dharmavyavasanasaṃvartanīyaṃ karmety ayam atrādīnavaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:20_4: ayathāvataś cārtham avijānato 'pi pratighāto na yukta iti pratighātāyoge ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_1.21_0: manaḥ pradoṣaḥ prakṛtipraduṣṭo 'yathārute cāpi hy ayuktarūpaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_1.21_1: prāg eva saṃdehagatasya dharme tasmād upekṣaiva varaṃ hy adoṣā //
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_2.1_0: ratnāni yo hi śaraṇapragato 'tra yāne jñeyaḥ sa eva paramaḥ śaraṇaṇagatānām /
SA20asmahsbu:25_0: sa eva paramaḥ śaraṇaṃ gatānām iti /
SA20asmahsbu:25_3: [Msa_9] sarvatragārthaḥ / abhibhavārthaḥ / te punar uttaratra nirdekṣyante /
SA20asmahsbu:25_4: tathāpy atra śaraṇapragatānāṃ bahuduṣkarakāryatvāt kecin notsahante ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_2.2_0: yasmād ādau duṣkara eṣa vyavasāyo duḥsādho 'sau naikasahasrair api kalpaiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_2.2_1: siddho yasmāt satvahitādhānamahārthas tasmād agre yāna ihāgraśaraṇārthaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:26_0: etena tasya śaraṇagamanavyavasāyasya praṇidhānapratipattiviśeṣābhyāṃ yaśohetutvaṃ darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_2.3_0: sarvān satvāṃs tārayituṃ yaḥ pratipanno yano jñāne sarvagate kauśalyayuktaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_2.3_1: yo nirvāṇe saṃsaraṇe 'py ekaraso 'sau saṃsṛtiśāntyekaraso 'sau jñeyo dhīmān eṣa hi sarvatraga evam /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_2.4_0: śaraṇagatim imāṃ gato mahārthāṃ guṇagaṇavṛddhim upaiti so 'prameyām /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_2.4_1: sphurati jagad idaṃ kṛpāśayena prathayati cāpratimaṃ mahārthadharmam //
SA20asmahsbu:28_3: na hi sā guṇavṛddhis tarkeṇa prameyā na saṃkhyā na kālenātyantikatvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:28_4: parārthapratipattir āśayataś ca karuṇā sphuraṇena prayogataś ca mahāyānadharmaprathanena /
SA20asmahsbu:32_0: anena gotrasyāstitvam agratvaṃ svabhāvo liṅgaṃ prabheda ādīnavo 'nuśaṃso dvidhāupamyaṃ cety eṣa prabhedaḥ saṃgṛhītaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_3.2_0: dhātūnām adhimukteś ca pratipatteś ca bhedataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:33_1: tasmād evaṃ jātīyako 'pi dhātubhedaḥ pratyetavya iti /
SA20asmahsbu:33_2: asti yānatraye gotrabhedaḥ / adhimuktibhedo 'pi satvānām upalabhyate prathamata eva kasyacit kvacid eva yāde 'dhimuktir bhavati so 'ntareṇa gotrabhedaṃ na syāt /
SA20asmahsbu:33_3: utpāditāyām api ca pratyayavaśenādhimuktau pratipattibheda upalabhyate kaścin nirvohā bhavati kaścin neti so 'ntareṇa gotraprabhedaṃ na syāt /
SA20asmahsbu:33_4: phalabhedaś copalabhyate hīnamadhyaviśiṣṭā bodhayaḥ [Msa_11] so 'ntareṇa gotrabhedaṃ na syāt bījānurūpatvāt phalasya /
SA20asmahsbu:34_1: tad dhi gotraṃ kuśalamulānām udagratve nimittaṃ sarvatve mahārthatve akṣayatve ca /
SA20asmahsbu:34_2: na hi śrāvakāṇāṃ tathodagrāṇi na ca sarvāṇi santi balavaiśāradyādyabhāvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_3.4_0: prakṛtyā paripuṣṭaṃ ca āśrayaś cāśritaṃ ca tat /
SA20asmahsbu:35_1: prakṛtisthaṃ samudānītam āśrayasvabhāvam āśritasvabhāvaṃ ca tad eva yathākramaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:35_3: guṇottāraṇārthana gotraṃ veditavyaṃ guṇā uttaranty asmād uddhavantīti kṛtvā /

SA20asmahsbu:amsa_9.25_0: dāhaśāntir yathā lohe darśane timirasya ca /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_9.25_1: cittajñāne tathā bauddhe bhāvābhāvo na śasyate //
SA20asmahsbu:144_0: yathā ca lohe dāhaśāntir darśane ca timiram etasya śāntir na bhāvo dāhatimirayor abhāvalakṣaṇatvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:144_2: evaṃ buddhānāṃ cittajñāne ca dāhatimirasthānīyayo rāgāvidyayoḥ śāntir na bhāvaḥ śasyate tadabhāvaprabhāvitatvāc cetaḥprajñāvimuktyā nābhāvas tena tena vimuktilakṣaṇena bhāvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_9.26_0: buddhānām amale dhātau naikatā bahutā na ca /
SA20asmahsbu:145_0: buddhānām anāsravadhātau naikatvaṃ pūrvadehānusāreṇa / na bahutvaṃ dehābhāvād ākāśavat /
SA20asmahsbu:146_1: etau ratnākarameghopamatve pūrṇacandramahādityopamatve ca ślokau gatārthau /
SA20asmahsbu:148_0: ekakāle sarvaraśmiviniḥsṛtyā sa ca buddhānām ekakāle jñānapravṛttiṃ darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_9.33_1: sakṛt jñeyaṃ tathā sarvaṃ buddhajñānaiḥ prabhāsyate //
SA20asmahsbu:149_0: mamatvābhāve jagajjñeyaprabhāsena ca / yathākramaṃ ślokau gatārthau /
SA20asmahsbu:150_1: tathā buddhajñānānām āvaraṇaṃ satvānām ābhājanatvena duṣṭatā pañcakaṣāyātyutsadatayā /
SA20asmahsbu:151_0: yathā pāṃśuviśeṣeṇa vastre raṅgavicitratā kvacid avicitratā /
SA20asmahsbu:151_1: tathaiva pūrvaprāṇidhānacaryābalādhānaviśeṣāt [Msa_40] buddhānāṃ vimuktau jñānavicitratā bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:152_0: etad anāsravadhātau buddhānāṃ trividhaṃ gāmbhīryam evam uktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:152_3: karmagāmbhīryaṃ daśabhiḥ / tat punar lakṣaṇagāmbhīryaṃ viśuddhilakṣaṇaṃ paramātmalakṣaṇam avyākṛtalakṣaṇaṃ vimuktilakṣaṇaṃ cārabhyoktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:152_4_0: karmagāmbhīryaṃ bodhipakṣādiratnāśrayatvakarma satvaparipācanakarma niṣṭhāgamanakarma dharmadeśanākarma nirmāṇādikṛtyakarma
SA20asmahsbu:152_4_1: jñānapravṛttikarma avikalpanakarma citrākārajñānakarma jñānāpravṛttikarma vimuktisāmānyajñānaviśeṣakarma cārabhyoktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:152_5: seyamanāsrave dhātau niṣprapañcatvād ākāśopame gāmbhīryaprabhedadeśanā yathā raṅgair ākāśacitraṇī veditavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:153_0: sarveṣāṃ nirviśiṣṭā tathatā tadviśuddhisvabhāvaś ca tathāgataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:153_1: ataḥ sarve satvās tathāgatagarbhā ity ucyate /
SA20asmahsbu:154_0: ābhyāṃ tāvad dvābhyāṃ prabhāvotkarṣaviśeṣeṇa buddhānāṃ vibhutvaṃ darśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_9.40_0: aprameyam acintyaṃ ca vibhutvaṃ bauddham iṣyate /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_9.40_1: yasya yatra yathā yāvat kāle yasmin pravartate //
SA20asmahsbu:155_0: anena tṛtīyena prakāraprabhedagāmbhīryaviśeṣābhyāṃ katham aprameyaṃ kathaṃ vācintyam ity āha /
SA20asmahsbu:155_1: yasya pudgalasyārthe tat pravartate yatra lokadhātau yathā tādṛśaiḥ prakārair yāvad alpaṃ [Msa_41] vā bahu vā yasmin kāle /
SA20asmahsbu:157_0: manasaḥ parāvṛttau vibhutvānucare nirvikalpe suviśuddhe jñāne paramaṃ vibhutvaṃ labhyate /
SA20asmahsbu:158_0: arthaparāvṛttau udgraharparāvṛttau ca kṣetraviśuddhivibhutvaṃ paramaṃ labhyate yena yathākāmaṃ bhogasaṃdarśanaṃ karoti /
SA20asmahsbu:159_0: vikalpaparāvṛttau sarveṣāṃ jñānānāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca sarvakālam avyāghāte paramaṃ vibhutvaṃ labhyate /
SA20asmahsbu:160_0: pratiṣṭhāparāvṛttāv apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇaṃ paramaṃ vibhutvaṃ labhyate buddhānām anāsrave dhātau /
SA20asmahsbu:161_1: maithunasya parāvṛttau dvayor buddhasukhavihāre ca dārā 'saṃkleśadarśane ca /
SA20asmahsbu:162_0: ākāśasaṃjñāvyāvṛttau dvayor eva cintitārthasamṛddhau ca yena gaganagarbho bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:163_1: tatra cāprameyaṃ vibhutvam acintyakarmānuṣṭhānaṃ buddhānām anāsrave dhātau veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_9.49_0: śubhe vṛddho loko vrajati suviśuddhau paramatāṃ śubhe cānārabdhvā vrajati śubhavṛddhau paramatām /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_9.49_1: vrajaty evaṃ loko diśi diśi jinānāṃ sukathitair apakvaḥ pakvo vā na ca punar aśeṣaṃ dhruvam iha //
SA20asmahsbu:164_0: anena yādṛśasya paripākasya nimittaṃ bhavati taddarśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:164_1: upacitakuśalamūlānāṃ ca vimuktau paramatāyām anupacitakuśalamūlānāṃ ca kuśalamūlopacaye /
SA20asmahsbu:164_2: apakvaḥ śubhavṛddhau paramatāṃ vrajanapākaṃ vrajati pakvaḥ suviśuddhau paramatāṃ vrajati /
SA20asmahsbu:164_3: evaṃ ca nityakālaṃ vrajati na ca niḥśeṣaṃ lokasyānantatvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_9.50_0: tathā kṛtvā caryāṃ kṛcchrāvāpyāṃ paramaguṇayogād bhutavartī mahābodhiṃ nityāṃ dhruvam aśaraṇānāṃ ca śaraṇam /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_9.50_1: labhante yaddhīrā daśadig sadā sadā sarvasamayaṃ tad āścaryaṃ loke suvidhacaraṇān nādbhutam api //
SA20asmahsbu:165_0: anena dvitīyena paripakvānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ paripākasyāścaryaṃ nāścaryaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:165_1: [Msa_43] lakṣaṇaṃ sadā sarvasamayam iti nityaṃ nirantaraṃ ca tad anubhūya mārgacaraṇaṃ suvidhicaraṇaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_9.51_0: kvaciddharmāñ ca kaṃ dharmyaṃ cakraṃ bahumukhaśatair darśayati yaḥ kvacij janmāntardhiṃ kvacid api vicitrāṃ janacarīm /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_9.51_1: kvacitkṛtsnāṃ bodhiṃ kvacid api ca nirvāṇam asakṛt na ca sthānāt tasmād vicalati sa sarvaṃ ca kurute /
SA20asmahsbu:166_3: na ca sthānāc calatīty anāsravād dhātoḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_9.52_0: na buddhānām evaṃ bhavati mama pakvo 'yam iti cāprapācyo 'yaṃ dehī api ca adhunāpācyata iti /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_9.52_1: vinā saṃskāraṃ tu prapacam upayāty eva janatā śubhair dharmair nityaṃ diśi diśi samantāt trayamukham /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_9.53_0: yathāyatnaṃ bhānuḥ pratataviṣadair aṃśavisaraiḥ prapākakaṃ sasyānāṃ diśi diśi samantāt prakurūte /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_9.53_1: tathā dharmārko 'pi praśamavidhidharmāṃśuvisaraiḥ prapākaṃ sasyānāṃ diśi diśi samantāt prakurūte //
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_9.54_0: yathaikasmād dīpād bhavati sumahān dīpanicayo 'prameyo 'saṃkhyeyo na ca sa punar eti vyayamataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_9.54_1: yathaikasmād buddhād pākābhavati sumahān paripākapākanicayo 'prameyo 'saṃkhyeyo na ca punar eti punar upaiti vyayamataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_9.55_0: yathā toyais tṛptiṃ vrajati na mahāsāgara iva na vṛddhiṃ vā yāti pratataviṣadāmbu praviśanaiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_9.55_1: tathā bauddhau dhātuḥ satatasamitaiḥ śuddhiviśanair na tṛptiṃ vṛddhiṃ vā vrajati paramāścaryam iha tat /
SA20asmahsbu:170_0: anena saptamena paripakvānāṃ vimuktipraveśe samudrodāharaṇena dharmadhātor atṛptiṃ cāvakāśadānād avṛddhiṃ dhyānādhikatvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:172_0: eṣa hetvarthaṃ phalārthaṃ cārabhya dvitīyaḥ ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:173_0: eṣa karmārthaṃ yogārthaṃ cārabhya tṛtīyaḥ ślokaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:173_1: trividhiṃ kāyādinirmāṇaṃ karma samādhidhāraṇīmukhābhyāṃ dvayena cāprameyeṇa puṇyajñānasaṃbhāreṇa samanvāgamo yogaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_9.60_1: kāyabhedā hi buddhānāṃ prathamas tu dvayāśrayaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:175_0: trividhiḥ kāyo buddhānāṃ / svābhāviko dharmakāya āśrayaparāvṛttilakṣaṇaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:176_0: tatra sāṃbhogikaḥ sarvalokadhātuṣu parṣanmaṇḍalabuddhakṣetranām aśarīradharmasaṃbhogakriyābhir bhinnaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_9.62_0: samaḥ sūkṣmaś ca tacchiṣṭaḥ kāyaḥ svābhāviko mataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:177_1: sūkṣmo durjñānatayā / tena sāṃbhogikena kāyena saṃbaddhaḥ saṃbhogavibhutve ca hetur yatheṣṭaṃ bhogadarśanāya /
SA20asmahsbu:178_0: nairmāṇikas tu kāyo buddhānām aprameyaprabhedaṃ buddhanirmāṇaṃ sāṃbhogikaḥ svāthasaṃpattilakṣaṇaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:178_2: evaṃ dvayārthasaṃpattir yathākramaṃ dvayoḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ sāṃbhogike ca kāye nairmāṇike ca /
SA20asmahsbu:179_0: sa punar nirmāṇakāyaḥ sadā vineyārthaṃ śilpasya vīṇāvādanādibhiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:179_2: nirvāṇasya ca darśanair vimocane mahopāyatvāt parārthasaṃpattilakṣaṇo veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_9.65_0: tribhiḥ kāyais tu vijñeyo buddhānāṃ kāyasaṃgrahaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_9.65_1: sāśrayaḥ svaparārtho yas tribhiḥ kāyair nirdarśitaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:180_0: tribhiś ca kāyair buddhānāṃ sarvakāyasaṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:180_1: ebhis tribhiḥ kāyaiḥ sāśrayaḥ svaparārtho nidarśitaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:180_2: dvayoḥ svaparārthaprabhāvitatvāt dvayoś ca tadāśritatvād yathā pūrvam uktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:181_0: te ca trayaḥ kāyāḥ sarvabuddhānāṃ yathākramaṃ tribhir nirviśeṣā āśrayeṇa dharmadhātor abhinnatvāt āśayena pṛthak buddhāśayasyābhāvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:181_2: teṣu ca triṣu kāyeṣu yathākramaṃ trividhā nityatā veditavyā yena nityakāyās tathāgatā ucyante /
SA20asmahsbu:182_0: caturvidhaṃ buddhānāṃ jñānam ādarśajñānaṃ samatājñānaṃ pratyavekṣājñānaṃ kṛtyānuṣṭhānajñānaṃ ca /
SA20asmahsbu:182_1: ādarśajñānam acalaṃ trīṇi jñānāni tadāśritāni calāni /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_9.68_1: sarvajñeyeṣv asaṃmūḍhaṃ na ca teṣv āmukhaṃ sadā //
SA20asmahsbu:183_0: ādarśajñānam amamam aparicchinnaṃ deśataḥ sadānugaṃ kālataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:183_1: sarvajñeyeṣv asaṃmūḍhaṃ sadāvaraṇavigamāt na ca teṣv āmukham anākāratvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:184_1: teṣāṃ ca samatādijñānānāṃ sarvaprakārāṇāṃ hetutvāt sarvajñānānāmākaropamaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:185_0: yadbodhisatvenābhisamayakāleṣu samatājñānaṃ pratilabdhaṃ tadbhāvanāśuddhito budhiprāptasyāpratiṣṭhitanirvāṇe niviṣṭaṃ samatājñānamiṣyate /
SA20asmahsbu:186_0: mahāmaitrīkaruṇābhyāṃ sarvakālānugaṃ yathādhimokṣaṃ ca satvānāṃ buddhabimbanidarśakaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:186_1: yataḥ kecit satvās tathāgataṃ nīlavarṇaṃ paśyanti kecit pītavarṇam ity evamādi /
SA20asmahsbu:188_0: kṛtyānuṣṭhānajñānaṃ sarvalokadhātuṣu nirmāṇair nānāprakārair aprameyair acintyaiś ca sarvasatvārthakaraṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_9.75_1: acintyaṃ buddhanirmāṇaṃ vijñeyaṃ tac ca sarvathā //
SA20asmahsbu:189_0: tac ca buddhanirmāṇaṃ sadā sarvathā cācintyaṃ veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:191_0: eka eva buddha ity etann eṣyate /
SA20asmahsbu:191_1: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ / gotrabhedāt / anantā hi buddhagotrāḥ satvāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:191_3: kuta etat / puṇyajñānasaṃbhāravaiyarthyaṃ ca syād anyeṣāṃ bodhisatvānām anabhisaṃbodhān na ca yuktaṃ vaiyarthyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:191_4: tasmād avaiyarthyād api naika eva buddhaḥ satvārthakriyāsākalyaṃ ca na syāt /
SA20asmahsbu:191_5: buddhasya buddhatve kasyacit apratiṣṭhāpanād etac ca na yuktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:191_6: na ca kaścid ādibuddho 'sti vinā saṃbhāreṇa buddhatvāyogād vinā cānyena buddhena saṃsthānāyogād ity anāditvād apy eko buddho na yuktaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:191_7: bahutvam api neṣyate buddhānāṃ dharmakāyasyābhedād anāsrave dhātau /
SA20asmahsbu:192_0: yā parikalpitena svabhāvenāvidyamānatā saiva paramā vidyamānatā pariniṣpannena svabhāvena /
SA20asmahsbu:192_1: yaś ca sarvathā 'nupalambhaḥ parikalpitasya svabhāvasya sa eva parama upalambhaḥ pariniṣpannasvabhāvasya /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_9.79_1: pratilambhaḥ paraś ceṣṭaḥ pratilambhaṃ ca paśyatām //
SA20asmahsbu:193_0: saiva paramā bhāvanā yo bhāvanāyā anupalambhaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:193_1: sa eva paramaḥ pratilambho yaḥ pratilambhānupalambhaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_9.80_0: paśyatāṃ gurutvaṃ tāṃ dīrghaṃ nimittaṃ vīryam ātmanaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:194_0: ye ca gurutvaṃ bahutvaṃ paśyanti adbhutadharmayuktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:194_3: ātmanaś ca vīryaṃ vayam ārabdhavīryā [Msa_59] buddhatvaṃ prāpsyāma iti /
SA20asmahsbu:194_4: teṣām evaṃ mānināṃ bodhisatvānām aupalambhikatvāt dūre bodhir nirūpyate /
SA20asmahsbu:195_0: kalpanāmātraṃ tv etat sarvam iti paśyatāṃ tasyāpi kalpanāmātrasyāvikalpanād akalpabodhisatvānām anutpattikadharmakṣāntilābhāvasthāyām arthataḥ prāptaiva bodhir ity ucyate /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_9.82_0: bhinnāśrayā bhinnajalāś ca nadyaḥ alpodakāḥ kṛtyapṛthaktvakāryāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_9.83_0: samudraviṣṭāś ca bhavanti sarvā ekāśrayā ekamahājalāś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_9.84_0: bhinnāśrayā bhinnamatāś ca dhīrāḥ svalpāvabodhāḥ pṛthagātmakṛtyāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_9.85_0: buddhatvaviṣṭāś ca bhavanti sarve ekāśrayā ekamahāvabodhāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_9.85_1: miśrekakāryāś ca mahopabhogyāḥ sadā mahāsatvagaṇasya te hi //
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_10.1_0: ādiḥ siddhiḥ śaraṇaṃ gotraṃ citte tathaiva cotpādaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:201_0: eṣa ca bodhyadhikāra ādim ārabhya yāvat bodhipaṭalānusāreṇānugantavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_10.2_0: jātājātā grāhikā grāhyabhūtā mitrādāttā svātmato bhrāntikā ca /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_10.2_1: abhrāntānyā āmukhā naiva cānyā ghoṣācārā caiṣikā cekṣikā ca //
SA20asmahsbu:202_0: jātā atītapratyutpannā / ajātā anāgatā / grāhikā ādhyātmikī yayālambanam adhimucyate /
SA20asmahsbu:202_2: mitrādāttā audārikī / svātmataḥ sūkṣmā / bhrāntikā hīnā viparītādhimokṣāt /
SA20asmahsbu:202_4: anāmukhā dūre viparyayāt / ghoṣācārā śrutamayī / eṣikā cintāmayī / īkṣikā bhāvanāmayī pratyavekṣaṇāt /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_10.3_0: hāryā kīrṇā 'vyāvakīrṇā vipakṣair hīnodārā āvṛtā 'nāvṛtā ca /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_10.3_1: yuktā 'yuktā saṃbhṛtā 'saṃbhṛtā ca gāḍhaṃ viṣṭā dūragā cādhimuktiḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:203_0: hāryā mṛdvī / vyavakīrṇā madhyā / avyavakīrṇā vipakṣair adhimātrā /
SA20asmahsbu:203_1: hīnā'nyayāne / udārā mahāyāne / āvṛtā sāvaraṇā viśeṣagamanāya /
SA20asmahsbu:203_4: gāḍhaṃ viṣṭā bhūmipraviṣṭā / dūragā pariśiṣṭāsu bhūmiṣu / adhimuktiparipanthe trayaḥ ślokāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:206_0: hīnāyā anudvegaḥ saṃsārāt / udārāyā udvegaḥ / anāvṛtāyāś cāvṛttiḥ / yuktāyā ayuktatā / saṃbhṛtāyā asaṃbhṛtiḥ paripanthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:207_6: bhrāntikāyāmāmukhāyāṃ śrutamayādikāyāṃ ca yāvat madhyāyāṃ viśeṣagamanaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:208_0: yathā śvā duḥkhārtaḥ satatam avitṛptaḥ kṣudhitako yathā kūrmaś cāsau jalavivarake saṃkucitakaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:208_2: yathā rājā rājñāṃ viṣaye vaśavartī viharati /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_10.10_0: tathā kāmisthātṛsvaparajanakṛtyārtham udite viśeṣo vijñeyaḥ satatam adhimuktayā vividhayā /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_10.10_1: mahāyāne tasya vidhivad iha matvā paramatāṃ bhṛśaṃ tasmin dhīraḥ satatam iha tām eva vṛṇuyāt //
SA20asmahsbu:209_0: api khalu kāminām adhimuktiḥ śvasadṛśī laukikasamādhigatānāṃ kūrmaprakhyā svārthavatāṃ bhṛtyopamā /
SA20asmahsbu:209_1: rājaprakhyā parārthavatāṃ / etam evārthaṃ pareṇopapādya mahāyānādhimuktau samādāpayati /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_10.12_0: yathā puṇyaṃ prasavate pareṣāṃ bhojanaṃ dadat /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_10.12_1: na tu svayaṃ sa bhuñjānas tathā puṇyamahodayaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_10.13_1: na tu svārthāśrayād dharmād deśitād upalabhyate //

SA20asmahsbu:265_0_0: dharmatulyatvād ekayānatā śrāvakādīnāṃ dharmadhātor abhinnatvāt yātavyaṃ yānam iti kṛtvā nairātmyasya tulyatvād ekayānatā

SA20asmahsbu:amsa_14.47_0: kathaṃ tathā durlabhadarśane munau bhaven mahārthaṃ na hi nityadarśanaṃ /

SA20asmahsbu:359_3: yān varjyāsevyety antarāyān anukūlāṃś ca yathākramaṃ /

SA20asmahsbu:amsa_16.12_0: dhyānaṃ vipakṣahīnaṃ jñānena gataṃ ca nirvikalpena /

SA20asmahsbu:379_0: yathā dānalakṣaṇaṃ caturvidham evaṃ śīlādīnāṃ veditavyaṃ /

SA20asmahsbu:380_0: tribhiḥ kāraṇais teṣāṃ dānādīnāṃ krameṇa nirdeśaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:380_2: bhoganirapekṣo hi śīlaṃ samātte śīlavān kṣamo bhavati kṣamāvān vīryam ārabhate ārabdhavīryaḥ samādhim utpādayati samāhitacitto yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20asmahsbu:380_4: hīnaṃ hi dānam utkṛṣṭaṃ śīlam evaṃ yāvad dhīnaṃ dhyānam utkṛṣṭā prajñeti /
SA20asmahsbu:380_6: audārikaṃ hi dānaṃ supraveśatvāt sukaratvāc ca /
SA20asmahsbu:380_7: sūkṣmaṃ śīlaṃ tato duṣpraveśatvād duṣkaratvāc ca /
SA20asmahsbu:380_8: evaṃ yāvad audārikaṃ dhyānaṃ sūkṣmā prajñeti /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_16.15_0: dāridyasyāpanayāc chaityasya ca lambhanāt kṣayāt kruddheḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:381_0: dāridryam apanayatīti dānaṃ / śaityaṃ lambhayatīti śīlaṃ tadvato viṣayanimittakleśaparidāhābhāvāt kṣayaḥ kruddher iti kṣāntis tayā krodhakṣayāt /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_16.16_1: upāyaṃ ca vibhutvaṃ ca sarvāsām eva kathyate //
SA20asmahsbu:382_0: pañcavidhā pāramitābhāvanā / upadhisaṃniśritā / tatropadhisaṃniśritā caturākārā hetusaṃniśritā yo gotrabalena pāramitāsu pratipattyabhyāsaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:382_10: atṛptāśayena vipulāśayena muditā--āśayena upakārāśayena nirlepāśayena kalyāṇāśayena ca /
SA20asmahsbu:382_11: tatra bodhisatvasya dāne 'tṛptāśayo yad bodhisatva ekasatvasyaikakṣaṇe gaṃgānadīvālukāsamān lokadhātūn saptaratnaparipūrṇān kṛtvā pratipādayet /
SA20asmahsbu:382_13: evaṃ ca pratikṣaṇaṃ gaṃgānadīvālikāsamān kalpān pratipādayet /
SA20asmahsbu:382_14: yathā caikasya satvasyaivaṃ yāvān satvadhātur anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripācayitavyas tam anena paryāyeṇa pratipādayet /
SA20asmahsbu:382_17: na ca bodhisatva evaṃrūpāṃ dānaparaṃparāṃ kṣaṇamātram api hāpayati /
SA20asmahsbu:382_19: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya dāne vipulāśaya iti /
SA20asmahsbu:382_20: muditataraś ca bodhisatvo bhavati tān satvān dānena tathānugṛhṇan /
SA20asmahsbu:382_21: na tv eva te satvās tena dānenānugṛhyamāṇā iti /
SA20asmahsbu:382_22: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya dāne muditāśayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:382_23: upakārakatarāṃś ca sa bodhisatvas tān satvān ātmanaḥ samanupaśyati /
SA20asmahsbu:382_27: na ca bodhisatvaḥ satveṣu tathā vipulam api dānamayaṃ puṇyam abhisaṃskṛtya pratikāreṇa vā artho bhavati vipākena vā iti /
SA20asmahsbu:382_28: ya evaṃrūpa āśayo 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya dānapāramitābhāvanāyāṃ nirlepāśayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:382_29: yadbodhisatvas tathā vipulasyāpi [Msa_103] dānaskandhasya vipākam satveṣv abhinandati nātmanaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:382_30: sarvasatvasādhāraṇaṃ ca kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati iti /

SA20asmahsbu:amsa_18.35_0: iti catuṣṭve kāraṇaṃ / deśanāyāṃ hi prayuktasya yasya ca deśanā yena ca /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_18.35_1: tatra jñānena prayojanaṃ kasya punar deśanā /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_18.35_2: / dharmasyārthasya / kena deśanā vacanena jñānena ca /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_18.35_3: tatra dharmārthayor deśanā / dharmasyoddeśanirdeśāt vākyena deśanā tayor eva dvayor sarvathā prāpaṇāt /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_18.35_5: ato yac ca yena ca deśyate tajjñānāt catasraḥ pratisaṃvido vyavasthāpitāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:558_0: etena pratisaṃvidāṃ nirvacanaṃ karam ca darśitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:558_1: pratyātmaṃ lokottareṇa jñānena sarvadharmasamatāṃ tathatāṃ etya uttarakālaṃ tatpṛṣṭalabdhena jñānena pravedanā paryāyādīnāṃ pratisaṃvid iti nirvacanaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:559_0: yaś ca saṃbhāro yad arthaṃ ca saṃdarśayati /
SA20asmahsbu:559_1: dvividhaḥ saṃbhāraḥ / tatra puṇyasaṃbhāraḥ saṃsāre 'bhyudayāya saṃvartate /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_18.39_0: dānaṃ śīlaṃ ca puṇyasya prajñā jñānasya saṃbhṛtiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:560_3: punaḥ prajñāyāṃ pariṇāmanāt sarvāḥ pañca pāramitā jñānasaṃbhāro veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_18.40_0: saṃtatyā bhāvanām etya bhūyo bhūyaḥ śubhasya hi /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_18.40_1: āhāro yaḥ sa saṃbhāro vīdhīre sarvārthasādhakaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:562_2: tasyāṃ nimittasamudācārāt / saptamyāṃ bhūmāv anābhogāya tadanybhūmidvayasṃgṛhītāya /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_18.43_0: niśrayāt pratipakṣāc ca avatārāt tathaiva ca /
SA20asmahsbu:564_0: ity ebhiś caturdaśabhir ākārair bodhisatvānāṃ smṛtyupastānabhāvanā viśiṣyate /
SA20asmahsbu:564_1: katham āśrayato mahāyāne śrutacintābhāvanāmayīṃ prajñām āśritya /
SA20asmahsbu:564_2: kathaṃ pratipakṣataḥ caturviparyāsapratipakṣāṇām apy aśuciduḥkhānityānātmasaṃjñānaṃ pratipakṣatvāt kāyādidharmanairātmyapraveśataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:564_3: katham avatārataḥ / caturbhiḥ smṛtyupasthānair yathākramaṃ duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgasatyāvatārāt svayaṃ pareṣāṃ cāvatāraṇāt /
SA20asmahsbu:564_7: kathaṃ prāptitaḥ kāyādīnāṃ na visaṃ yogāya nāvasaṃyogāya /
SA20asmahsbu:564_9: katham anuvṛttitaḥ laukikānāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ cānuvṛttyā tadupasaṃhitasmṛtyupasthānabhāvanāt tebhyas tadupadeśārthaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:564_14: katham utpattitaḥ saṃcintyabhavopapattau cakravartyādibhūtasya viśiṣṭakāyavedanādisaṃpattau tadasaṃkleśataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:564_15: kathaṃ mātrataḥ mṛdvā api smṛtyupasthānabhāvanāyās tad anyebhyo adhimātratvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:564_17: kathaṃ bhāvanātaḥ atyantaṃ tadbhāvanāt nirupadhiśeṣanirvāṇe 'pi tadakṣayāt /
SA20asmahsbu:564_18: kathaṃ samudāgamataḥ / daśasu bhūmiṣu buddhatve ca samudāgamāt /
SA20asmahsbu:565_0: yāvatyaḥ smṛtyupasthānabhāvanā uktāḥ tadvipakṣāṇāṃ pratipakṣeṇa samyakprahāṇabhāvaneti samastaṃ samyakprahāṇalakṣaṇaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_18.46_1: manaskārasya ca tyāge praveśe caiva bhūmiṣu //
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_18.47_0: satvānāṃ paripāke ca abhiṣeke ca dhīmatāṃ //
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_18.48_0: kṣetrasya ca viśuddhyarthaṃ niṣṭhāgamana eva ca /
SA20asmahsbu:567_7: ye [Msa_142] ca vipakṣās teṣāṃ pratipakṣeṇa samyakprahāṇabhāvanā veditavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:568_0: etena chandaṃ janayati / vyāyacchate vīryam ārabhate /
SA20asmahsbu:568_1: cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti / samyak pradadhāti / ity eṣāṃ padānām arthanirdeśaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:568_2: chandaṃ hi niśritya śamathavipaśyanākhyaṃ yogaṃ bhāvayatīti vyāyacchate /
SA20asmahsbu:568_3: sā ca bhāvanā śamathapragrahopekṣānimittaiḥ saha bhāvyatge /
SA20asmahsbu:568_4: tasmāt sā sanimittikā / kathaṃ punar bhāvyate / yac chamathapragrahopakleśayor layāuddhatyayoḥ pratipakṣeṇa vīryam ārabhate /
SA20asmahsbu:568_7: eṣā yogabhāvanā yathoktaprabhedeṣu sarvasamyakprahāṇeṣu pratipakṣa ucyate /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_18.50_1: sarvārthasiddhau jāyante ātmanaś ca parasya ca //
SA20asmahsbu:569_0: sarvārthasiddhir laukikī lokottarā ca veditavyā ca / śeṣaṃ gatārthaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_18.51_0: niśrayāc ca prabhedāc ca upāyād abhinirhṛteḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:572_1: aṣṭānāṃ prahāṇasaṃskārāṇāṃ chando vyāyāmaḥ śaddhā vyāvasāyikaḥ
SA20asmahsbu:572_3: praśrabdhir anugrahātmakaḥ smṛtiḥ saṃ prajanyaṃ copanibandhakaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:572_5: dvitīyena visāraprajñānāt / cetanā copekṣā ca prātipakṣika upāyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_18.54_1: praṇidher vaśitāyaś ca dharmaprāpteś ca nirhṛtiḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:573_0: tatra darśanaṃ cakṣuḥ pañcavidhaṃ māṃsacakṣuḥ divyaṃ cakṣuḥ āryaṃ prajñācakṣuḥ dharmacakṣuḥ buddhacakṣuś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:573_2: tābhir upasaṃkramya bhāṣā cittaṃ cāgatiṃ ca gatiṃ ca viditvā niḥsaraṇāyāvavadanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:573_3: sthitivikrīḍitaṃ yasmāt bodhisatvānāṃ bahuvidhaṃ nirmāṇādibhiḥ samādhivikrīḍitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:573_4: praṇidhir yena praṇidhijñānena praṇidhānabalikā bodhisatvāḥ praṇidhānavaiśeṣikatayā vikrīḍanti /
SA20asmahsbu:573_5: yeṣāṃ na sukaraṃ saṃkhyā kartuṃ kāyasya vā prabhāyā vā svarasasya veti vistareṇa yathā daśabhūmike sūtre /
SA20asmahsbu:573_6: vaśitā yathā tatraiva daśa vaśitā nirdiṣṭāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_18.55_0: bodhiś caryā śruta cātra śamatho 'tha vipaśyanā /
SA20asmahsbu:574_0: śraddhendriyasya bodhiḥ padam ālambanam ity arthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:577_0: etena yasyām avasthāyāṃ yasyāvabodhāt bodhyaṅgāni vyavasthāpyante tadupadiṣṭaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:577_1: bhūmipraviṣṭāvasthāyāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvasatvānāṃ ca samatāvabodhād yathākramaṃ dharmanairātmyenātmaparasamatā ca /
SA20asmahsbu:583_1: tataḥ prītiḥ sarvaṃ kāryaṃ sadā prīṇayati /
SA20asmahsbu:585_0: sarvadauṣṭhulyasamutpādanāt / yathā strīratnena cakravartī sukham anubhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:587_1: upekṣocyate nirvikalpaṃ jñānaṃ tayā bodhisatvaḥ yathākāmaṃ sarvatra viharati tatpṛṣṭhalabdhena ca vihāreṇānyasyopagamāt /
SA20asmahsbu:587_3: yathā cakravartinaḥ pariṇāyakaratnaṃ caturaṅgabalakāyam upanetavyaṃ copapraṇayati /
SA20asmahsbu:587_4: apanetavyaṃ cāpanayati / tatra ca gatvā vāsaṃ kalpayati yatrākhinnaḥ caturaṅgo balakāyaḥ paraiti /
SA20asmahsbu:589_0: etena yad bodhyaṅgaṃ yathāṅgaṃ tad abhidyatitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:591_2: tadvyavasthāne ca sūtrādike bhagavatā kṛte sa eva praveśas tena tadrthāvabodhāt /
SA20asmahsbu:591_4_0: vākkāyobhayakramasaṃgrahāt / pratipakṣasya bhāvanā bhāvanā samyagvyāyāmādayo yathākramaṃ jñeyāvaraṇasya mārgāvaraṇasya ca
SA20asmahsbu:591_4_1: vaiśeṣikaguṇāvaraṇasya ca samyagvyāyāmena dīrghaṃ [Msa_146] hi kālaṃ akhidyamāno jñeyāvaraṇasya pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayati /
SA20asmahsbu:591_5: samyaksmṛtyā śamathapragrahopekṣānimitteṣu layāuddhatyābhāvān mārgasaṃmukhībhāvāyāvaraṇasya pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayati /
SA20asmahsbu:591_6: samyaksamādhinā vaiśeṣikaguṇābhinirhārāyāvaraṇasya pratipakṣaṃ bhāvayaty evam aṣṭau mārgāṅgāni vyavasthāpyante /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_18.66_0: cittasya citte sthānāc ca dharmapravicayād api /
SA20asmahsbu:592_1: dharmāṇāṃ ca pravicayād yathākramaṃ śamatho vipaśyanā ca veditavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:592_2: na tu vinā samyaksamādhinety etac chamathavipaśyanālakṣaṇaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:594_0: sā ca śamathavipaśyanā sarvatragā yaṃ yaṃ guṇam ākaṅkṣati tatra tatra tadbhāvanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:594_1: yathoktaṃ sūtre / ākaṅkṣed bhikṣur aho vatāhaṃ kāmair iti vistreṇa yāvat tena bhikṣuṇā imāv eva dvau dharmau bhāvayitavyau /
SA20asmahsbu:594_2: yad uta śamathaś vipaśyanā cety evam ādi /
SA20asmahsbu:594_4: vipaśyanāṃ vā / ubhayāṃśa yadā yugapad ubhayaṃ bhāvayati /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_18.67_0: prativedhe ca niryāṇe animitte hy asaṃskṛte //
SA20asmahsbu:595_0: ity upaniṣan matety evamādinā śamathavipaśyanāḥ prabhedaḥ karma ca nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:595_1: yoga upāyo veditavyaḥ / tatra prativedhaḥ prathamabhūmipraveśaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:595_4: animittaṃ saptamī bhūmiḥ / asaṃskṛtam anyadbhūmitrayam anabhisaṃskāravāhitvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:595_5: saṃskāro hi saṃsṛtaṃ tad atra nāstīty asaṃskṛtaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:595_6: tad eva ca bhūmitrayaṃ niśritya buddhakṣetraṃ c pariśodhayitavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:595_7: buddhatvaṃ ca prāptavyaṃ / tad etad yathākramaṃ pariśuddhir viśuddhiś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:597_3: kṣiprābhisaṃbodhe sarvaṃ pāpaṃ pratideśayāmi yāvad bhavatu jñānaṃ saṃbodhāyeti pratideśanā 'numodanādhyeṣaṇā pariṇāmanā /
SA20asmahsbu:597_7: asmin pañcavidha upāye sarvabhūmiṣu bodhisatvānām asamaṃ tadanyaiḥ kauśalyam ity ayaṃ prabhedaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_18.71_1: parīttā mahatī sā ca mahatī trividhā punaḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:598_0: atrāpi prabhedaḥ karma ca dhāraṇyāḥ darśitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:598_1: tatra trividhā dhāraṇī / pūrvakarmavipākena / śrutābhyāsena / dṛṣṭadharmabāhuśrutyena grahaṇadhāraṇasāmarthyaviśeṣaṇāt /
SA20asmahsbu:598_2: samādhisaṃniśrityena ca / sā punar vipākaśrutābhyāsābhyāṃ parīttā veditavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:598_3: samādhinā mahatī sāpi mahatī punas trividhā /
SA20asmahsbu:598_4: abhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ mṛdvī bhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ akuśalabhūmikānāṃ madhyā saptasu bhūmiṣu /
SA20asmahsbu:598_5: pariśuddhabhūmikā tv adhimātrā śeṣāsu bhūmiṣu ity ayaṃ prabhedo dhāraṇyāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_18.74_0: cetanā chandasahitā jñānena preritā ca tat /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_18.75_0: hetubhūtaṃ ca vijñeyaṃ cittāt sadyaḥ phalaṃ ca tat /
SA20asmahsbu:599_1: atra praṇidhānaṃ svabhāvato nidānato bhūmitaḥ prabhedataḥ karmataś ca paridīpitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:599_3: jñānaṃ nidānaṃ / sarvabhūmiṣv iti bhūmiḥ / tac ca praṇidhānaṃ hetubhūtaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:599_5: āyatyāṃ vābhipretārthasiddhyarthaṃ cittāt punaḥ sadyaḥphalaṃ cittamātrāt yathārthasamṛddhitā vedutavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:599_7: yasya na sukarā saṃkhyā kartuṃ kāyasya veti vistaraḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:599_8: citram adhimukticaryābhūmāv evaṃ ca syām iti /
SA20asmahsbu:599_10: viśuddhaṃ uttarottarāsu bhūmiṣu viśuddhiviśeṣād ā bodher ity eṣa prabhedataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_18.77_0: nairātmyaṃ dvividhaṃ jñeyo hy ātmagrāhasya cāśrayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:600_4: sa eva samādhis trividho jñeyo grāhyagrāhakabhāvataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:601_0: trividhasya grāhasya gocarasya grāhakā ye samādhayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:601_1: te śūnyatādisamādhayaḥ iti grāhyagrāhakabhāvena trayaḥ samādhayo jñātavyāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:604_1: tatra saṃskārā anityāḥ sarvasaṃskārā duḥkhāḥ ity apraṇihitasya samādhyupaniṣatbhāvena deśitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:604_4: kaḥ punar anityārtho yāvac chāntārthaḥ ity āha /
SA20asmahsbu:605_1: yan nityaṃ nāsti tad anityaṃ teṣāṃ yat parikalpitalakṣaṇaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:605_4: evaśabdenāvadhāraṇaṃ parikalpata ātmā nāsti parikalpamātraṃ tv astīti parikalpitalakṣaṇasyābhāvārtho 'nātmārtha ity uktaṃ bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:606_0: tatra kṣaṇikaṃ sarvaṃ saṃskāram iti paścād vacanād iyaṃ pratijñā veditavyā /
SA20asmahsbu:606_1: tat punaḥ kathaṃ sidhyati / kṣaṇikatvam antareṇa saṃskārāṇāṃ pravṛtter ayogāt /
SA20asmahsbu:606_3: sā cāntareṇa pratikṣaṇam utpādanirodhau na yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:606_4: atha kālāntaraṃ sthitvā pūrvottaranirodhotpādataḥ prabandheneṣyate vṛttiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:606_5: tadanantaraṃ pravṛttir na syāt prabandhābhāvāt naiva cotpannasya vinā prabandhena kālāntaraṃ bhāvo yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:606_7: hetuto hi sarvaṃ saṃskṛtam utpadyate bhavatīty arthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:606_8: tad yadi bhūtvā punar uttarakālaṃ bhavati tasyāvaśyaṃ hetunā bhavitavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:606_9: vināhetunā ādita ivābhāvāt / na ca tat tenaiva hetunā bhavitum arhati tasyopayuktahetukatvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:606_10: na cānyo hetur uplabhyate / tasmāt pratikṣaṇam avaśyaṃ pūrvahetukam anyad bhavatīti veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:606_11: evaṃ vinā prabandhenotpannasya kālāntaraṃ bhāvo no yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:606_12: atha apy evam iṣyata notpannaṃ punar utpadyate yad arthaṃ hetunā bhavitavyaṃ syād utapannaṃ tu kālāntareṇa paścān nirudhyate notpannamātram eveti /
SA20asmahsbu:606_13: tatpaścāt kena nirudhyate / yad utpādahetunaiva tad ayuktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:606_14: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ / utpādnirodhayor virodhāt / na hi virodhayos tulyo hetur upalabhyate /
SA20asmahsbu:606_17: kena virodhāt / āgamena ca / yad uktaṃ bhagavatā / māyopamās te bhikṣo saṃskārā āpāyikās tāvat kālikā itvarapratyupasthāyina iti /
SA20asmahsbu:606_18: manaskāreṇa ca yogināṃ / te hi saṃskārāṇām udayavyayau manasikurvantaḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ teṣāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyanti /
SA20asmahsbu:606_19: anyathā hi teṣām api nirvidvirāgavimuktayo na syur yathānyeṣāṃ maraṇakālādiṣu nirodhaṃ paśyantāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:606_20: yadi cotpannaḥ saṃskāraḥ kālāntaraṃ tiṣṭhet sa svayam eva vā tiṣṭhet svayam eva sthātuṃ samarthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:606_21: sthitikāraṇena vā kenacit / svayaṃ tāvad avasthānam ayuktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:606_22: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ / paścāt svayam asthiteḥ / kkena vā so 'nte punaḥ sthātuṃ na samarthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:606_25: athāpi syād vināpi sthitikāraṇena vināśakāraṇābhāvāt avatiṣṭhate /
SA20asmahsbu:606_26: labdhe tu vināśakāraṇe paścād vināśayati agnineva śyāmateti /
SA20asmahsbu:606_27: tad ayuktaṃ tasyābhāvāt / na hi vināśakāraṇaṃ paścād api kiṃcid asti /
SA20asmahsbu:606_30: tathā hi tatsaṃbandhāt śyāmatāyāḥ saṃtatir visadṛśī gṛhyate ma tu sarvathaivāpravṛttiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:606_31: apām api kvathyamānānām agnisaṃbandhād alpataratamotpattito 'timandyād ante punar anutpattir gṛhyate /
SA20asmahsbu:606_32: lakṣaṇaikāntyāt / ekāntikaṃ hy saṃskṛtalakṣaṇam uktaṃ bhagavatā yad uta saṃskṛtasyānityatā /
SA20asmahsbu:606_34: kaṃcit kālam asyānityatā na syād iti anaikāntikam anityatālakṣaṇaṃ prasahyate /
SA20asmahsbu:606_35: athāpi syāt pratikṣaṇam apūrvotpattau tad evedam iti pratyabhijñānaṃ na syād iti /
SA20asmahsbu:606_36: tad bhavaty eva sādṛśasya anuvṛtter māyākārapalakavat /
SA20asmahsbu:606_38: kathaṃ gamyate / nirodhataḥ / na hi tathaivāvasthitasyānte nirodhaḥ syād ādilakṣaṇanirviśiṣṭatvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:606_39: tasmān na tat tad evety avadhāryate ante pariṇāmopalabdheś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:606_40: pariṇāmo hi nāmānyathātvaṃ / tad yadi nādita evārabdhaṃ bhaved ādhyātmikabāhyānāṃ bhāvānām ante pariṇāmo nopalabhyeta /
SA20asmahsbu:606_41: tasmād ādita evānyathātvam ārabdhaṃ yat krameṇābhivardhamānam ante vyaktim āpadyante kṣīrasyeva dadhyavasthāyāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:606_42: yāvat tu tad anyathātvaṃ sūkṣmatvān na paricchidyate /
SA20asmahsbu:606_43: tāvat sādṛśyānuvṛttes tad evedam imi jñāyata iti siddhaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:606_45: kṣaṇikatvaṃ prasiddhaṃ / kutaś ca prasiddhaṃ / taddhetutvaphalatvataḥ / kṣaṇikahetutvāt / kṣaṇikaphalatvāc cety arthaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:606_46: [Msa_151] kṣaṇikaṃ hi cittaṃ prasiddhaṃ tasya cānye saṃskārāś cakṣūrūpādayo hetutaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:606_48: na tv akṣaṇikāt kṣaṇikaṃ bhavitum arhati yathā nityād anytyatam iti /
SA20asmahsbu:606_49: cittsya khalv api sarve saṃskārāḥ phalaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:606_50: katham idaṃ gamyate / upāttatvād ādhipatyāc chuddhasatvānuvṛttitaś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:606_51: cittena hi sarve saṃskārāś cakṣurādayaḥ sādhiṣṭhānā upāttāḥ sahasaṃmūrchnāḥ tadanugrahānuvṛttitaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:606_52: tasmāt te cittasya phalaṃ cittasya cādhipatyaṃ saṃskāreṣu /
SA20asmahsbu:606_53: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā / cittenāyaṃ loko nīyate cittena parikṛṣyate cittasyotpannasyotpannasya vaśe vartate iti /
SA20asmahsbu:606_54: tathā viñānapratyayaṃ nāma rūpam ity uktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:606_55: tasmāc cittasya phalaṃ / śuddhacittānuvṛttitaś ca / śuddhaṃ hi yogināṃ cittaṃ saṃskārā anuvartante /
SA20asmahsbu:606_56: yathoktaṃ / dhyāyī bhikṣuḥ ṛddhimāṃś cittavaśe prāpta imaṃ dāruskandhaṃ sacet suvarṇam adhimucyate tad apy asya tahaiva syād iti /
SA20asmahsbu:606_58: satvānuvṛttitaś ca / tathā hi pāpakāreṣu satveṣu bāhyā bhāvā hīnā bhavanti /
SA20asmahsbu:606_59: puṇyakāreṣu ca praṇītāḥ / atas taccittānuvartanāt cittaphalatvaṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ siddhaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:606_60: tataś ca teṣāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ / na hi kṣaṇikasyākṣaṇikaṃ phalaṃ yujyate tadanuvidhāyitvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:606_61: evaṃ tāvad aviśeṣeṇa saṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ dvābhyāṃ ślokābhyāṃ sādhitaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:606_62: ādhyātmikānāṃ punaḥ sādhanārthaṃ pañca ślokā veditavyāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:607_0: ādyas taratamenāpi yāvat kṣaṇikaṃ sarvasaṃskṛtam iti /
SA20asmahsbu:607_9: hīnatvena [Msa_152] viśiṣṭatvena ca yo durgatau cotpadyamānānāṃ yathākramaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:607_10: bhāsvaratvena yo nirmitakāmeṣu parinirmitakāmeṣu rūpārūpyeṣu copapannānāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:607_14: abījatvena yas teṣām evārhataś caram eṣāṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:607_15: pratibimbatvena / yo aṣṭavimokṣadhyāyināṃ samādhivaśena pratibimbānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ utpādaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:607_16: etasyāṃ caturdaśavidhāyām utpattāv ādhyātmikānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ hetumān aviśeṣādibhiḥ kāraṇair veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:607_18: yadi hi tasya hetutvena viśeṣo na syāt tad uttarāyāḥ saṃskārapravṛtter uttarottaraviśeṣo nopalabhyeta hetvaviśeṣāt /
SA20asmahsbu:607_20: kṣaṇikatvasiddhiḥ / taratamotpāde mānaviśeṣāt / mānaṃ pramāṇam ity arthaḥ / na hi pratikṣaṇaṃ vinā 'nyatvena parimāṇaviśeṣo bhavet /
SA20asmahsbu:607_21: upacayotpāde cayāpārthyāt / upastambho hi cayaḥ / tasyāpārthyaṃ syād antareṇa kṣaṇikatvaṃ tathaivāvasthitatvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:607_22: ayogāc copacayasyaiva / na hi pratikṣaṇaṃ vinā puṣṭatarotpattyā yujyetopacayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:607_24: na hi tiṣṭhaty āśraye ca tadāśritasyānavasthānaṃ yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:607_25: yena tiṣṭhati ta ārūḍhānavasthānavad anyathā hy āśrayatvaṃ na saṃbhavet /
SA20asmahsbu:607_27: ādyanāśāvikārataḥ / ma hi tathāsthitasyaiva rāgādibhir vikāraḥ saṃbhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:607_28: na cāvasthāntareṣu paripāka ādāv avināśe saty ante vikārābhāvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:607_29: tathā hīnaviśiṣṭotpattau kaṇikatvaṃ veditavyaṃ yathā vikāraparipākotpattau /
SA20asmahsbu:607_30: na hi tahtāsthiteṣv eva saṃskāreṣu karmavāsanā vṛttiṃ labhate yato durgatau vā syād utpattiḥ sugatau vā /
SA20asmahsbu:607_36: na hi saṃskārāṇāṃ deśāntarasaṃkrāntilakṣaṇā gatir nāma kācit kriyā yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:607_37: sa hy utpannā vā saṃskāraṃ deśāntaraṃ gamayed anutpannā vā /
SA20asmahsbu:607_38: yad utpannā tena gatikāle na kaṃcid gata iti sthitasyaiva gamanaṃ nopapadyate /
SA20asmahsbu:607_39: athānutpannā tena asatyāṃ gatau gata iti na yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:607_40: sā ca kriyā yadi taddeśastha eva saṃskāre kāritraṃ karoti na yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:607_41: sthitasyānyadeśāprāpteḥ / athānyadeśasthe na yujyate / vinā kriyayānyadeśāprāpteḥ / na ca kriyā tatra vā anyatra vā deśe sthitā saṃskārād anyopalabhyate /
SA20asmahsbu:607_42: tasmān nāsti saṃskārāṇāṃ deśāntarasaṃtatyutpādād anyā gatiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:607_50: asti svabhāvavaśena yathā vāyos tiryaggamanam agner ūrdhvaṃ jvalanam apāṃ nimne syandanaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:607_55: na hi pratikṣaṇaṃ hetubhāvam antareṇa tathāsthitasyānyasmin kāle punar bījabhāvo yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:607_57: na ca śakyaṃ pūrvaṃ sabījatvaṃ carame kṣaṇe nirbījatvam abhyupagantuṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:607_59: tathā hi caramatvam eva na saṃbhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:607_62: ekāntāt sādhitam ādhyātmikaṃ sarvasaṃskṛtam kṣaṇikam iti /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_18.91_1: cittānuvṛtteḥ pṛcchātaḥ kṣaṇikaṃ bāhyam apy ataḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:608_0: kiṃ punas tad bāhyaṃ / catvāri mahābhūtāni / ṣaḍvidhaś cārthaḥ / varṇagandharasasparśaśabdā dharmāyatanikaṃ ca rūpaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:608_1: ato bhūtānāṃ ṣaḍvidhārthasya ca kṣaṇikatvaṃ vidhīyate /
SA20asmahsbu:608_2: kathaṃ vidhīyate / apāṃ tāvac śoṣavṛddheḥ / utsaras taḍāgādiṣv apāṃ krameṇa vṛddhiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:608_3: śoṣaś copalabhyate / tac cobhayam antareṇa pratikṣaṇaṃ pariṇāmaṃ na syāt paścād viśeṣakāraṇābhāvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:608_4: vāyoḥ prakṛtyā ca calatvād vṛddhihānitaś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:608_5: na hy avasthitasya calatvaṃ syāt tatsvabhāvād iti prasādhitam etat /
SA20asmahsbu:608_8: tac chabenāpaś ca gṛhyante vāyuś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:608_9: adbhyo hi vāyusahitābhyaḥ pṛthivī saṃbhūtā vivartakāle /
SA20asmahsbu:608_14: sa cāntareṇa pratikṣaṇaṃ anyotpattiṃ na yujyate vināśakāraṇābhāvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:608_15: varṇagandharasasparśānāṃ pṛthivyādibhis tulyakāraṇatvāt tathaiva kaṇikatvaṃ veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:608_17: [Msa_154] na hi tejasy utpanne tejaḥsahotpannam indhanaṃ tathaivāvatiṣṭhate /
SA20asmahsbu:608_18: na ca dagdhendhanaṃ tejaḥ sthātuṃ samarthaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:608_20: ślokabadhānurodhād varṇādīnāṃ pūrvam abhidhānaṃ paścāt tejasaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:608_21: śabdaḥ punar yo 'pi kālāntaram upalabhyate ghaṇṭhādīnāṃ tasyāpi kṣaṇikatvaṃ veditavyaṃ tāratamyopalabdheḥ na hy asati kṣaṇikatve pratikṣaṇamandataratamopalabdhiḥ syāt /
SA20asmahsbu:608_22: dharmāyatanikasyāpi rūpasya kṣaṇikatvaṃ prasiddham eva cittānuvṛtter yathā pūrvam uktaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:608_24: pṛcchrayate khalv api sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ sidhyati kathaṃ kṛtvā /
SA20asmahsbu:608_26: kasmād bhavān anityatvam icchati na saṃskārārāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ necchatīti /
SA20asmahsbu:608_27: yady evaṃ vadet pratikṣaṇam anyatvasyāgrahaṇād iti sa idaṃ syād vacanīyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:608_28: prasiddhakṣaṇikabhāveṣv api pradīpādiṣu niścalāvasthāyāṃ tadagrahaṇād akṣaṇikatvaṃ kasmān neṣyate /
SA20asmahsbu:608_29: yady evaṃ vadet pūrvavat paścād agrahaṇād iti /
SA20asmahsbu:608_30: sa idaṃ syād vacanīyaḥ / saṃskārāṇām api kasmād evaṃ neṣyate /
SA20asmahsbu:608_31: yady evaṃ vadet vilakṣaṇatvāt pradīpāditadanyasaṃskārāṇām iti /
SA20asmahsbu:608_32: sa idaṃ syād vacanīyaḥ / dvidhaṃ hi vailakṣaṇyaṃ svabhāvavailakṣaṇyaṃ vṛttivailakṣaṇyaṃ ca /
SA20asmahsbu:608_33: tad yadi tāvat svabhāvavailakṣaṇyam abhipretam ata eva dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:608_34: na hi tatsvabhāva eva tasya dṛṣṭānto bhavati yathā pradīpaḥ pradīpasya gaur vā gor iti /
SA20asmahsbu:608_35: atha vṛttavailakṣaṇyam ata eva dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ pradīpapradīpānāṃ prasiddhatvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:608_37: kaccid icchasi yāne tiṣṭhati yānāruḍho gacched iti /
SA20asmahsbu:608_38: yadi no hīti vadet / sa idaṃ syād vacanīyaḥ / cakṣurādiṣu tiṣṭhatsu tad āśritaṃ vijñānaṃ prabandhena gacchatīti na yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:608_39: yady evaṃ vadet nanu ca dṛṣṭaṃ vartisaṃniśrite pradīpe prabandhena gacchati vartyā avathānam iti /
SA20asmahsbu:608_40: sa idaṃ syād vacanīyaḥ / na dṛṣṭaṃ tatprabandhena vartyā pratikṣaṇaṃ vikārotpatter iti /
SA20asmahsbu:608_41: yady evaṃ vadet sati kaṇikatve saṃskārāṇāṃ kasmāt pradīpād iva kṣaṇikatvaṃ na siddham iti /
SA20asmahsbu:608_43: sadṛśasaṃtatiprabandhavṛttyā hi kṣaṇikatvam eṣāṃ na prajñāyate /
SA20asmahsbu:608_44: yataḥ saty apy aparāparatve tad evedam iti viparyāso jāyate /
SA20asmahsbu:608_45: itarathā hi anityanityaviparyāso na syāt tadabhāve saṃkleśo na syāt kutaḥ punar vyavadānam ity evaṃ paryanuyogato 'pi kṣaṇikatvaṃ sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ prasiddhaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_18.92_0: prajñaptyastitayā vācyaḥ pudgalo dravyato na tu /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_18.94_0: dravyasan yady avācyaś ca vacanīyaṃ prayojanaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_18.95_0: lakṣaṇāl lokadṛṣṭāc ca śāstrato 'pi na yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_18.96_0: dvaye sati ca vijñānasaṃbhavāt pratyayo na saḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_18.96_1: nairarthakyād ato draṣṭā yāvan moktā na yujyate //
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_18.97_0: svāmitve sati cānityam aniṣṭaṃ na pravartayet /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_18.98_0: darśanādau ca tadyatnaḥ svayaṃbhūr na trayād api /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_18.100_0: tathā sthitasya naṣṭasya prāg abhāvād anityataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_18.101_1: ātmopalambhe doṣaś ca deśito yata eva ca //
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_18.103_1: ayatnamokṣaḥ sarveṣāṃ na mokṣaḥ pudgalo 'sti vā //
SA20asmahsbu:610_0: pudgalaḥ kim astīti vaktavyo nāstīti vaktavyaḥ / āha /
SA20asmahsbu:611_0: prajñaptyastitayā vācyaḥ pudgalo dravyato na tu /
SA20asmahsbu:612_0: yataś ca prajñaptito 'stīti vaktavyo dravyato nāstīti vaktavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:612_1: evam anekāṃśavādaparigrahe naivāstitve doṣāvakāśo na nāstitve /
SA20asmahsbu:612_2: sa punar dravyato nāstīti kathaṃ veditavyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:612_3: nopalambhāt / na hi sa dravyata upalabhyate rūpādivat upalabdhir hi nāma buddhyā pratipattiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:612_4: na ca pudgalaṃ buddhyā na pratipadyante pudgalavādinaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:612_5: uktaṃ ca bhagavatā / dṛṣṭa eva dharme ātmānam nupalabhate prajñāpayatīti kathaṃ nopalabdhā bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:612_6: na sa evam upalabhyamāno dravyata upalabdho bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:612_7: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ / viparyāsāt tathā hy anātmany ātmeti viparyāsa ukto bhagavatā /
SA20asmahsbu:612_8: tasmād ya evaṃ pudgalagrāho viparyāsaḥ saḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:612_9: katham idaṃ gamyate / saṃkleśāt / satkāyadṛṣṭikleśalakṣaṇo hy eṣa saṃkleśo yad uta ahaṃ mameti /
SA20asmahsbu:612_10: na ca viparyāsaḥ saṃkleśo bhavitum arahati /
SA20asmahsbu:612_11: na caiṣa saṃkleśa iti kathaṃ veditavyaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:612_12: kliṣṭahetutaḥ / tathā hi tadhetukāḥ kliṣṭā [Msa_156] rāgādaya utpadyante /
SA20asmahsbu:613_0: yatra punar vastuni rūpādisaṃjñake prajñaptiḥ pudgala iti tasmāt kim ekatvena pudgalo vaktavya āhosvid anyatvena /
SA20asmahsbu:617_0: ekatve hi skandhānām ātmatvaṃ prasajyate pudgalasya ca dravyasatvaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:617_2: evaṃ hi pudgalsya prajñaptito 'stitvād avaktavyatvaṃ yuktaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:618_0: ye punaḥ śāstuḥ śāsanam atikramya pudgalsya dravyato 'stitvam icchanti ta idaṃ syur vacanīyāḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:619_0: dravyasan yady avācyaś ca vacanīyaṃ prayojanaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:622_1: yathāgnir andhanān nānyo nānyo vaktavya iti /
SA20asmahsbu:623_0: lakṣaṇāl lokadṛṣṭāc ca śāstrato 'pi na yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:624_0: ekatvenānyatvena ca agnir hi nāma tejodhātur indhanaṃ śeṣāṇi bhūtāni /
SA20asmahsbu:624_1: teṣāṃ ca bhinnaṃ lakṣaṇam ity anya evāgnir indhanāt /
SA20asmahsbu:624_2: loke ca vināpy agninā dṛṣṭam indhanaṃ kāṣṭād vināpi cendhanenāgnir iti siddham anyatvaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:624_3: śāstre ca bhagavatā na kvacid agnīndhanayor avācyatvam uktam ity ayuktam etat /
SA20asmahsbu:624_4: vinā punar indhanenāgnir astīti katham idaṃ vijñāyate /
SA20asmahsbu:624_5: upalabdhes tathā hi vāyunā vikṣiptaṃ dūram api jvalat paraiti /
SA20asmahsbu:624_6: athāpi syād vāyus tatrendhanam iti ata evāgnīndhanayor anyatvam it siddhiḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:624_7: kitaḥ / dvayena hi upalabdher iti prakṛtaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:624_8: dvayaṃ hi tatropalabhyate arcir vāyuś cendhanatvena /
SA20asmahsbu:624_9: asty eva pudgalo ya eṣa draṣṭā yāvad vijñāntā kartā bhoktā jñātā moktā [Msa_157] ca /
SA20asmahsbu:624_10: na sa draṣṭā yujyate / nāpi yāvan moktā / sa hi darśanādisaṃjñakānāṃ vijñānānāṃ pratyayabhāvena vā kartā bhavet svāmitvena vā /
SA20asmahsbu:625_1: dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasaṃbhavāt pratyayo na saḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:626_0: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ / nairarthakyāt / na hi tatra kiṃcit sāmarthyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:627_0: svāmitve sati cānityam aniṣṭaṃ na pravartayet /
SA20asmahsbu:628_0: sa hi vijñānapravṛttau svāmībhavann aniṣṭaṃ vijñānam anityaṃ na pravartayet /
SA20asmahsbu:628_1: aniṣṭaṃ ca / naiva tasmād ubhayathāpy asaṃbhāvāt /
SA20asmahsbu:628_2: asau draṣṭā yāvan moktā na yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:631_2: na caivaṃ pudgalasya / tasmān na so 'sti dravyataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:631_3: tasmiṃś ca dravyata iṣyamāṇe buddhasya bhagavataḥ
SA20asmahsbu:633_0: gambhīrābhisaṃbodhaḥ / asādhāraṇābhisaṃbodhaḥ / lokottarābhisaṃbodhaḥ / ni hi pudgalābhisaṃbodhe kiṃcid gambhīram abhisaṃbuddhaṃ bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:633_1: na tīrthyāsādhāraṇāṃ / na lokānucitaṃ / tathā hy eṣa grāhaḥ sarvalokagamyaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:633_2: tīrthyābhiniviṣṭaḥ / dīrghasaṃsārocitaś ca / api khalu pudgalo draṣṭā bhavan yāvad vijñātā darśanādiṣu saprayatno vā bhaven niṣpratyatno vā /
SA20asmahsbu:634_0: saprayatnasya vā punar asau prayatnaḥ svayaṃbhūr vā bhaved ākasmikaḥ / tatpratyayo
SA20asmahsbu:635_0: darśanādau ca tadyatnaḥ svayaṃbhūr na trayād api /
SA20asmahsbu:638_0: neti vartate / niṣprayatnasya vā punaḥ sataḥ siddhaṃ bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:640_1: ity asati vyāpare pudgalasya darśanādau katham asau draṣṭā bhavati /
SA20asmahsbu:641_0: yāvad vijñātā doṣatrayād ity uktaṃ katamasmād doṣatrayāt /
SA20asmahsbu:643_0: yadi darśanādiṣu prayatna ākasmiko yato darśanādīni /
SA20asmahsbu:643_1: na tarhi teṣāṃ pudglaḥ karteti katham asau draṣṭā bhavati yāvad vijñātā sati vākasmikatve nirapekṣatvāt na kadācit prayatno na syād anityo na syāt /
SA20asmahsbu:643_2: nitye ca prayatne darśnādīnāṃyugapac ca nityaṃ ca pravṛrtiḥ syād iti doṣaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:643_3: tasmān na yujyate darśnādiṣu prayatnasya svayaṃbhūtvaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:644_0: tathā sthitasya naṣṭasya prāg abhāvād anityataḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:645_1: tasya tathā sthitasya prayatnatvaṃ na yujyate /
SA20asmahsbu:645_2: prāg abhāvāt / sati hi tatprayatnatve na kadācit pudgalo nāstīti /
SA20asmahsbu:645_3: kim arthaṃ prāk prayatno na syād yadā notpannaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:645_5: tṛtīyaś ca kaścitpakṣo nāsti yan na sthito na vinaṣṭaḥ syād iti /
SA20asmahsbu:645_7: evaṃ tāvad yuktima āśritya dravyataḥ pudgalo nopalabhyate /

SA20asmahsbu:771_9: jñānasaṃgṛhītās trayaḥ / sarvaṃ tathāgatasya [Msa_188] kāyakarma jñānapūrvaṃgamaṃ jñānānuparivarti /
SA20asmahsbu:771_10: sarvaṃ vākkarma sarvaṃ manaskarmeti karmasaṃgṛhāitās trayaḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:772_0: anena tribhiś ca kāyaiḥ sarvākārabodhyupagamatvāt sarvajñeyasarvākārajñānāc ca sarvākārajñatā bhagavataḥ paridīpitā /
SA20asmahsbu:772_1: trayaḥ kāyāḥ svābhāvikaḥ sāṃbhogiko nairmāṇikaś ca /
SA20asmahsbu:772_2: sarvajñeyasarvākārajñānaṃ punar atra sarvasatvānāṃ devamanuṣyādīnāṃ sarvasaṃśayacchedena karmaṇā nirdiṣṭaṃ /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_20-21.61_0: akṣayair asamair yukto guṇair lokeṣu dṛśyase /
SA20asmahsbu:amsa_20-21.61_1: maṇḍaleṣv apy adṛśyaś ca sarvathā devamānuṣaiḥ //
SA20asmahsbu:774_2: sa ca buddhānāṃ svabhāvaḥ / sarvabodhisatvabhūminiryātatvaṃ hetuḥ /
SA20asmahsbu:774_4: nānālokadhātuṣu dṛśyamānatā nirmāṇakāyena [Msa_189] parṣaṇmaṇḍaleṣv api dṛśyamānatā sāṃbhogikena kāyena /
SA20asmahsbu:774_5: sarvathā cādṛśyamānatā dharmakāyeneti trividhā prabhedavṛttir iti /
